titleStmt.title: A commentarie or exposition vpon the second chapter of the prophecie of Amos Deliuered in xxi. sermons in the parish church of Meysey-Hampton in the diocesse of Glocester. By Sebastian Benefield ...
titleStmt.author: Benefield, Sebastian, 1559-1630.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Griffin for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the three Pigeons,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part 2 of: Benefield, Sebastian. A commentary or exposition upon the three first chapters of the prophecie of Amos.
Reproductions of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the three Pigeons
